languages.text: "Это известно лишь ему. Но если брат мой опасается, что не сможет в решающий момент рассудить, как поступить правильно — это сделаю за него я".
"Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."
languages.original_text: "Это известно лишь ему. Но если брат мой опасается, что не сможет в решающий момент рассудить, как поступить правильно — это сделаю за него я".

traits.locale_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right call at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right call at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “只要他自己知道。不过，如果我的技术兄弟担心他在关键时刻无法做出正确决定，那我会替他做这个决定。”
languages.original_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."

traits.locale_text: “只要他自己知道。不过，如果我的技术兄弟担心他在关键时刻无法做出正确决定，那我会替他做这个决定。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「知るのは彼だけです。ですが、もしも彼が大事な局面で正しい判断を下せないと恐れているのなら、自分が代わりを勤めましょう」
languages.original_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."

traits.locale_text: 「知るのは彼だけです。ですが、もしも彼が大事な局面で正しい判断を下せないと恐れているのなら、自分が代わりを勤めましょう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Lui seul le sait. Mais si mon technofrère craint de ne pas prendre la bonne décision au moment critique, je le ferai à sa place. »
languages.original_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."

traits.locale_text: « Lui seul le sait. Mais si mon technofrère craint de ne pas prendre la bonne décision au moment critique, je le ferai à sa place. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Solo él lo sabe. Pero si mi tecnohermano teme que no tomará la decisión correcta cuando llegue el momento, lo haré por él».
languages.original_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."

traits.locale_text: «Solo él lo sabe. Pero si mi tecnohermano teme que no tomará la decisión correcta cuando llegue el momento, lo haré por él».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Das weiß nur er. Aber wenn mein Tech-Bruder befürchtet, im kritischen Moment nicht die richtige Entscheidung zu treffen, dann werde ich es für ihn tun."
languages.original_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."

traits.locale_text: "Das weiß nur er. Aber wenn mein Tech-Bruder befürchtet, im kritischen Moment nicht die richtige Entscheidung zu treffen, dann werde ich es für ihn tun."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu yalnızca o bilir. Ancak tekno kardeşim, en önemli anda doğru kararı veremeyeceğinden endişeleniyor ise bu kararı onun yerine ben veriyor olacağım."
languages.original_text: "Only he knows. But if my tech-brother fears that he might not make the right decision at the critical moment, then I will do it for him."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu yalnızca o bilir. Ancak tekno kardeşim kritik anda doğru kararı veremeyeceğinden endişeleniyor ise, bu kararı onun yerine ben vereceğimdir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
